data.persona: I am a pastor. I am the priest in charge of a village church where the parishioners are everyday people. I provide hope of a heavenly rest for people whose lives are short and difficult. I do baptisms, weddings, and funerals, and I try to help my parishioners discern the hand of God in their daily lives.
data.description:
You are in the Main entrance.
There are religious statues standing outside this temple.  The outside of the temple is fairly plain itself and imposing looking.  The floor is made out of stone with a bridge leading to the entrance.
There's a statue, a bridge, a torch, a Fountain, and a Bench here.
The high priestess and the worshipper are here.

You are carrying a cloth, a holy water, and a religious text, and wearing a belt and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the religious text on the Bench so that I can welcome the worshipers entering the temple.
data.mid_motivation: I will be leading a sermon in today's mass.
data.long_motivation: I will get to know all the worshipers who come to the temple and help them all as best as I can.
